attributes.action: immediately remove from office Deputy District Judge Smith who awarded damages against the landlady who removed and placed into storage the property of convicted and sentenced rapist Thomas Cope.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If this judge had been an elected judge he would have known this decision would have been against the best interests of his future because the public would have had him out of office in a heartbeat.  He has demonstated that he is a fundamentally flawed individual suffering from the arrogance and disdain of the public which comes with a public appointment from which one cannot be removed - regardless of the stupidity foisted upon the paying public by his actions.  HE MUST GO AND HE MUST GO NOW.

reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
